price: Et Nous n’avons attribué l’immortalité à nul homme avant toi. Est-ce que si tu meurs, toi, ils seront, eux éternels ?
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnā libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khālidūna
